question: Identify the statement/s given below that does not correspond to the functions of cortisol
(i) Maintains cardiovascular system and kidney functions
(ii) Produces anti-inflammatory reactions
(iii) Maintains electrolyte balance, osmosis and blood pressure
(iv) Suppresses immune response
(v) Stimulates RBC production
explanation: Based on the provided key (Ans 3), the option '(iv) only' is selected as not corresponding. (Note: Biologically, Cortisol IS an immunosuppressant. However, Mineralocorticoids like Aldosterone are primarily responsible for electrolyte balance (iii). There might be an error in the question phrasing or key, but the key explicitly points to this choice).
